forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun bathes the city in a gentle golden light, casting clarity over the urban landscape. With a high temperature settling near 64, the day gifts us a refreshing chill alongside a westerly breeze, making the air feel just a touch crisper. The marine layer that often cloaks the Bay is nowhere to be found; instead, it allows a breathtaking view towards the Golden Gate, the hills framing the city standing sentinel, their outlines sharp against the vivid blue sky.

As evening approaches, the temperature will ease down to a comfortable low of around 52. The evening sky will transform into a canvas of soft clouds, partially obscuring the stars while still offering glimpses of the fading light. A light jacket or sweater is the perfect companion for those planning to wander the streets or dine al fresco. As you stroll, perhaps consider visiting a local café or indulging in a leisurely book on a bench in one of the nearby parks, absorbing the tranquil ambiance this lovely day offers.
